translations.chinese: 其以長沙、豫章、象郡、桂林、南海立番君芮為長沙王。」
translations.english: Enfeoff Fan Jun Wu Rui as King of Changsha with Changsha, Yuzhang, Xiangjun, Guilin, and Nanhai."

translations.chinese: 又曰：「故粵王亡諸世奉粵祀，秦侵奪其地，使其社稷不得血食。
translations.english: He also said: "The former Yue kings' descendants have maintained the Yue sacrifices. Qin invaded and seized their territory, causing their ancestral temples to lack blood offerings.

translations.chinese: 諸侯伐秦， 亡諸身帥閩中兵以佐滅秦，項羽廢而弗立。
translations.english: The feudal lords attacked Qin. The descendants personally led Minzhong troops to assist in destroying Qin. Xiang Yu deposed them and did not establish them.

translations.chinese: 今以為閩粵王，王閩中地，勿使失職。」
translations.english: Now establish them as King of Minyue, ruling Minzhong territory, do not let them lose their office."
The emperor then established his western capital at Luoyang.
